channel.title: Machine Learning on Neetz World
channel.description: Recent content in Machine Learning on Neetz World

item.title: Machine Learning basics
item.description:
We have heard about Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning and Deep Learning topics a lot. Everyone is talking about these topics. But what are they, how are they different from each other and when to use what while talking are important questions to answer.

I am starting on these topic, so I thought it would be amazing to share with you about what all I learned and it may help you too. So, Let start with what comes inside what.
